alert.note: Alert for Haywood (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 16 at 7:20PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...LOW VISIBILITY POSSIBLE TONIGHT ALONG I-40 IN PIGEON RIVER GORGE IN NORTHERN HAYWOOD COUNTY... A Wildfire burning in Haywood County on the north side of Interstate 40 between mile marker 3 and mile marker 4 is expected to create smoke that may fill up part of the Pigeon River Gorge overnight. Travelers may encounter sharply reduced visibility along Interstate 40 generally between the Tennessee state line and the Fines Creek exit...mile marker 15. Be on the lookout for slow or stopped traffic in poor visibility due to the smoke, particularly west of the Harmon Den exit...mile marker 7.
